description:
The course will take you to the overall journey of HTML and HTML 5. Here, you will start learning on how you can add small and basic characters and by the end of this video tutorial you will be able to create a HTML webpage with full of variety of elements. The course will not take too much time to complete as it has 22 lectures in total 10 sections.

This HTML 5 course is made for the beginners who are planning to become a smart web developer. The course will help you by teaching you all the required lessons of HTML and HTML5. The course content is qualitative with a lot of good examples and links to useful contents.

Who is the target audience?

This course is for people who are new to web designing and development or existing web developers who want to use HTML and HTML 5 to build attractive, intuitive and accessible web sites.

What am I going to get from this course?

From this tutorial you will learn fundamentals of HTML and Web standards. You will also learn HTML 5 so that you can create web pages and web layouts on your own.
title: Easy Steps To Become A HTML and HTML5 Expert
